name: Combo Burst
description: Have characters cheer you on as you play the level!

popup-enable.name: Enable Combo Burst
popup-enable.description: Enable or disable the combo burst animations

sprite-pack.name: Sprite Pack
sprite-pack.description: The sprite pack to use for the pop-up animations. Check mod desc for list of sprites.

popup-percent.name: Appear every %
popup-percent.description: The percentage difference needed for a popup

popup-defaultsfx.name: Use default SFX if needed
popup-defaultsfx.description: Use sound effect if a custom sprite doesn't have their own sound effect.

popup-sfxslider.name: Use GD SFX slider
popup-sfxslider.description: Use Geometry Dash's SFX volume slider for the mod. Overwrites the mod's volume setting.

popup-random.name: Use randomizer
popup-random.description: Characters will be randomly picked. If disabled, characters will be shown sequentially.

popup-platformer.name: Show in Platformer
popup-platformer.description: Show combo burst animations after every checkpoint in platformer mode. (MacOS not supported)

popup-practice.name: Show in Practice Mode
popup-practice.description: Show combo burst animations in practice mode.
